network_attack.label: Network Attack
network_attack.description: Monitors and alerts on malicious activities targeting network infrastructure, including intrusion attempts, DDoS attacks, and unauthorized access.

malware.label: Malware
malware.description: An alert indicating the detection of malicious software designed to disrupt, damage, or gain unauthorized access to a computer system.

anomalous_behavior.label: Anomalous Behavior
anomalous_behavior.description: This alert type monitors and reports unusual or suspicious activities that deviate from established baseline behaviors, potentially indicating security threats or compromised systems.

data_security.label: Data Security
data_security.description: Monitors and alerts on potential data breaches, unauthorized access, or leakage of sensitive information.

vulnerability_configuration_risk.label: Vulnerability Configuration Risk
vulnerability_configuration_risk.description: Alert indicating potential security risks due to misconfigured or vulnerable system settings that could be exploited by attackers.
